name: United States
overview: The United States of America (USA) is one of the most popular study destinations for international students. With world-class universities, cutting-edge research facilities, and diverse academic programs, the USA offers excellent opportunities for academic and professional growth along with strong global career prospects.

whyStudyInUSA.title: Globally Ranked Universities
whyStudyInUSA.description: The USA is home to many top-ranked universities offering internationally recognised degrees valued worldwide.

whyStudyInUSA.title: Wide Range of Programs
whyStudyInUSA.description: Students can choose from thousands of academic programs and specialisations across various fields of study.

whyStudyInUSA.title: Research & Innovation Focus
whyStudyInUSA.description: Strong emphasis on research, innovation, and practical learning with state-of-the-art facilities.

whyStudyInUSA.title: Multicultural Environment
whyStudyInUSA.description: Diverse campus culture with students from around the world, offering global exposure and networking opportunities.

whyStudyInUSA.title: Work Opportunities
whyStudyInUSA.description: Students can work during studies and gain practical experience through CPT and OPT programs.

whyStudyInUSA.title: Strong Career Prospects
whyStudyInUSA.description: Excellent employment opportunities with global companies and high earning potential after graduation.

eligibility.notes: Some programs may require GRE/GMAT and relevant work experience.

work_rights: Up to 20 hours per week on-campus during study; CPT and OPT available after program completion.
